Package com.movlad.semviz.application

Class Viewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movlad.semviz.application.Viewer
  • public class Viewer
extends java.lang.Object
    Structure gathering a scene, camera, renderer configuration that allows navigating a scene of three-dimensional object around an orbit.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Viewer​(int width, int height)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addObject​(Object3d object)
      Adds an object to the scene.
      void clearScene()
      Removes all objects from the scene.
      void fromViewItems​(java.util.List<ViewItem> viewItems)
      Builds a scene from a list of view items (base geometry for all the clouds).
      com.jogamp.opengl.awt.GLCanvas getGlCanvas()  
      void removeObject​(int i)
      Removes an object from the scene.
      void removeObject​(java.lang.String id)
      Adds an object to the scene.
      void replaceObject​(int i, Object3d object)
      Replace an object at the given index in the scene with another.
      void setObjectVisibility​(int i, boolean isVisible)
      Sets the visibility of the object at a given index.
      void start()
      Starts the viewer animation.
      void stop()
      Stops the viewer animation; used whenever the scene is modified to prevent the resource from being accessed by multiple components concurrently.

        Parameters:

      • replaceObject

        public void replaceObject​(int i,
                          Object3d object)
        Replace an object at the given index in the scene with another.
        Parameters:
        i - is the position where the replacement takes place
        object - is the replacement three-dimensional object

      • setObjectVisibility

        Sets the visibility of the object at a given index.
        Parameters:

        isVisible - is true if the object is visible
